snippet: Grant Hanley’s goal in the 80th minute broke a 2-2 tie and spoiled the 70th birthday of Alex Ferguson, the manager of Manchester United.
lead_paragraph: Grant Hanley’s goal in the 80th minute broke a 2-2 tie and spoiled the 70th birthday of Alex Ferguson, the manager of Manchester United.

headline.seo: United, Upset by Blackburn, Still Trails Manchester City
headline.main: Manchester United Is Upset; Still Trails Manchester City
headline.print_headline: Manchester United Is Upset; Still Trails Manchester City
